briefdescription.para: Key for the "all scopes" combined view.
Per-scope log buffers. Key is scope name, value is entry vector.

detaileddescription.para: Special key "__all__" contains all entries (for "All Scopes" view).

briefdescription.para: Maximum number of entries to retain per scope buffer.
Mutex for thread-safe access to the log buffers.
Whether to automatically scroll to the bottom on new entries.
Previous autoScroll state to detect toggle events.
Flag to nudge scroll up one entry when auto-scroll is disabled.
Flag to indicate that new content was added and scroll is needed.
Tracks if user was at bottom in the previous frame.
Whether new entries are currently accepted into the buffer.
Counts how many log entries were skipped while logging was paused.
Minimum log level to display (filters out lower levels).
Text filter for searching within log messages.
Current filter level selection index for the combo box.
Collection of all unique scopes seen in log entries.
Currently selected scope index in the combo box (0 = "All").
Currently active scope filter (empty = show all).
Callback function to notify external systems of scope filter changes.

detaileddescription.para: Called when user selects a scope in the combo box. Signature: void(const std::string& scope) where empty string means "all".

briefdescription.para: Adds a scope to the collection if not already present.
Adds an entry to a specific buffer, trimming if necessary.
Returns the currently active buffer based on scope selection.
Returns an ImVec4 color for the given log level.

parameterdescription.para: The log level to get a color for.

simplesect.para: The color corresponding to the log level.

briefdescription.para: Returns a string label for the given log level.

parameterdescription.para: The log level to get a label for.

briefdescription.para: Generates a simple timestamp string (HH:MM:SS.mmm).
Adds a log entry to the appropriate scope buffer(s).

detaileddescription.para: Thread-safe. Adds to both the scope-specific buffer and the "all" buffer.

briefdescription.para: Convenience method to add a debug-level log entry.

parameterdescription.para: The source scope or module name.

briefdescription.para: Convenience method to add an info-level log entry.

parameterdescription.para: The source scope or module name.

briefdescription.para: Convenience method to add a warning-level log entry.

parameterdescription.para: The source scope or module name.

briefdescription.para: Convenience method to add an error-level log entry.

parameterdescription.para: The source scope or module name.

briefdescription.para: Clears all log entries from all buffers.
Sets the maximum number of entries to retain per scope.
Enables or disables auto-scrolling to the latest entry.
Sets the minimum log level to display.

parameterdescription.para: Entries below this level are hidden.

briefdescription.para: Sets a callback to be invoked when the scope filter changes.

detaileddescription.para: The callback receives the selected scope string, or an empty string when "All" is selected. Use this to integrate with LogManager::setScopeFilter().

parameterdescription.para: Function to call on scope filter change.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current number of log entries in the active buffer.

simplesect.para: The number of entries currently stored.

briefdescription.para: Renders the log widget using ImGui.
Debug widget for displaying log output in a scrollable ImGui panel.

detaileddescription.para: This widget maintains separate buffers for each log scope and renders them in a scrollable text area. It supports filtering by log level, clearing the buffer, and auto-scrolling to the latest messages.
Each scope has its own buffer with a maximum of 1000 entries, allowing efficient scope-based filtering without losing messages from other scopes.

simplesect.para: This widget uses internal locking for adding log entries from multiple threads.
